FulfillmentLineRel.name: FulfillmentLineRel
FulfillmentLineRel.description: Represents a relationship between two fulfillment order lines.

AssociatedFoItemInventory.description: Inventory level for the associated fulfillment order item.

AssociatedFulfillOrderItemId.description: The identifier of the associated fulfillment order line item.

AssociatedLineRole.description: The role of the associated fulfillment order line item.

AssociatedQuanScaleMethod.description: Method used to scale the quantity of the associated order item summary relative to the main fulfillment order item.

FulfillmentOrderId.description: The ID of the parent fulfillment order.

MainFulfillOrderItemRole.description: The role of the primary fulfillment order line item.

MainFulfillmentOrderItemId.description: The ID of the associated fulfillment order line item.

Name.description: The name of the fulfillment order line relationship.

ProductRelationshipTypeId.description: The type of relationship between two assets.
